title: The Double Life of My Billionaire Husband
overview: Sebastian Klein, a renowned Klein family member, was rumored to be a loser after a prison stint. Natalie Quinn, unaware of the truth, married him, leading to a covert billionaire marriage.Sebastian Klein, known to most as the illegitimate son of the prestigious Klein family, has been plagued by rumors suggesting he's nothing more than a loser who recently emerged from a stint in prison. Society, guided by these harsh tales, deemed him an undesirable match for any sensible young woman. That was until Natalie Quinn defied expectations by marrying him. Little did she realize the astonishing truth concealed beneath the surface: she had, unknowingly, wed a covert billionaire.
